original_text: I took the deed of purchase—the sealed copy containing the terms and conditions, as well as the unsealed copy—
korean_text: 법과 규례대로 봉인하고 봉인하지 아니한 매매 증서를 내가 가지고

sentences.original_text: I took the deed of purchase
the sealed copy containing the terms and conditions
as well as the unsealed copy
